awd_titl_txt: Acquisition of an HPLC/MS System for Laboratory Instruction and Undergraduate Research
awd_abstract_narration: The Department of Chemistry will acquire an electron-impact,                    thermospray mass spectrometer interfaced to a High Performance                  Liquid Chromatograph (HPLC) for use in undergraduate education.                 The new instrument will provide experience in separations and                   mass spectrometry for students in both the American Chemical                    Society accredited Bachelor of Science program and the Bachelor                 of Arts program in chemistry.  A set of new experiments has                     been designed which will incorporate LC-MS into the analytical                  instrumental courses. The new instrument will complement                        chromatographic systems recently acquired through Hughes                        Foundation funds.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
